EmailTemplate.description: Send notification to customer whenever case status is set as Resolved.and it's inactive
EmailTemplate.name: Case Resolved Notification - Due to Inactivity
EmailTemplate.subject: Closing Ecolab Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
We are reaching out about your case {!Case.CaseNumber} regarding {!Case.Subject}.
It is been {!Case.Days_Open__c} days since we opened your case and we haven't heard from you, so we wanted to reach out and let you know we are going to close this case. If you would like to reopen your case, please click the following link:
{!$Label.Ecolab_Community_URL}{!Case.Id}
If you are unable to click the above link, please copy and paste it into your browser's address bar.
Thank you for being an Ecolab customer.
Best,
Ecolab Support Team
-----
Please do not reply to this email. This is a system generated email to inform you of updates to your Ecolab Case. This message was generated from https://connect.ecolab.com.
